original_text: Think about the things that God has done. If God has bent something, nobody can make it straight again. Think about the things that God has done.
korean_text: 하나님께서 행하시는 일을 보라 하나님께서 굽게 하신 것을 누가 능히 곧게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Think about the things that God has done.
nobody can make it straight again.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그것을 다시 곧게 만들 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: Think about the things that God has done.
